title: We’ll stop worrying and learn to love the misinformation bomb
description: 2026 will be the year that we stop worrying and learn to love the misinformation bomb. We will end our pious incantations about post-truth and halt the witchfinder searches for inaccuracy, bias, and offense. The problem is not fake news, it’s that no one believes — or rather listens, and pays attention — to liberal...
